roleset.name: the violent act of punching someone in the face/chin
roleset.note: CHIN-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT-P01-3. Framed by Claire. (from chin.01-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: ...I'm about a minute away from PRO chinning them, wheel spinning over their lifeless bodies, and leaving them a rough sketch of the way home.
